message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,750. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to your business.
